subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Marc Gasol, who “looks like he lost 50 pounds,” according to one teammate, was averaging 20.2 points a game entering Sunday amid speculation he might leave the Memphis Grizzlies as a free agent.
snippet: Marc Gasol, who “looks like he lost 50 pounds,” according to one teammate, was averaging 20.2 points a game entering Sunday amid speculation he might leave the Memphis Grizzlies as a free agent.
